import React from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { logout } from '../store/auth'; import { language } from '../utils/utils'; function Navbar() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { user } = useSelector(state => state.auth); const SignOut = async () => { dispatch(logout()); localStorage.removeItem('userData') } return (
